Mitigation Strategy: Mitigate (Password policies/MFA VPN usage when remote).

Risk Description: Data loss due to insufficient backups

Mitigation Strategy: Mitigate (Leverage protection services Cloudflare, AWS Shield. Configure firewall rules to block unnecessary traffic).

Vulnerability: Access privileges, ineffective off boarding policy
Mitigation Strategy: Mitigate (Role based access control, Disable USB devices, Utilize SIEM tools, enforce strict off boarding policy).
